script
attributes.value:
var stage = 'clsa-dcs-f3.NeuropsychologicalBatteryScoring:'
var list=[
'STP_DOTERRR_COF3.G_1_1',

]

var arr = []
for(var i=0; i<list.length; i++) {
  arr.push($(stage + list[i]))
}
newSequence(arr).trimmer().size().multiply(100).div(arr.length)
